definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: A new graveyard has been added near the east coast of the Hinterlands at the Overlook Cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 在辛特蘭望海崖處增加了一個新的墓地。

sentences.english: His grandfather lies in the churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 他祖父葬於教堂的墓地。

sentences.english: Those mounds were the tombs of poor people before 1945.
sentences.chinese: 那些亂墳堆，都是解放前窮人的墓地。

sentences.english: Rough- hewn , angular notes, like stones in the wall of a churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 粗獷，生硬的音符，像墓地圍牆上的石頭般。

sentences.english: Maoqinggou cemetery was located in Liangcheng County, Inner Mongolia, dated back to the Eastern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 毛慶溝墓地是內蒙古涼城縣東周時期的墓地。

sentences.english: Maoqinggou cemetery was located in Liangcheng County, Inner Mongolia, dated back to the Eastern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 毛慶溝墓地是內蒙古涼城縣東周時期的墓地。

sentences.english: An ancient cemetery and a white top of Ararat on the right.
sentences.chinese: 一處古代墓地，遠處的雪山是亞拉拉特山。

sentences.english: Before setting out, he went to a different part of the cemetery to be alone.
sentences.chinese: 動身前，狗王去了墓地的不同區域獨自沉思。

sentences.english: And now it seems to me the beautiful uncut hair of graves.
sentences.chinese: 現在它對於我更像是美麗而缺少修剪的墓地上的髮絲。

sentences.english: The tomb of Filippo Brunelleschi in the crypt.
sentences.chinese: 地窖下布魯內黎斯基的墓地。

sentences.english: The cemetery hosted a profusion of table tombs, headstones, and memorials.
sentences.chinese: 墓地裏滿是桌形墓穴，墓碑，和紀念堂。

sentences.english: But Today, Chinese visit their family graves to tend to any underbrush that has grown.
sentences.chinese: 但今天，中國訪問他們的家庭墓地去任何增長草叢。

sentences.english: bury an urn in Elizabeth New Jersey, B'nai Israel Cemetery
sentences.chinese: 把骨灰甕埋在新澤西州伊麗莎伯布萊猶太人墓地。

sentences.english: They buried the corpse in the churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 他們在教堂墓地裏把死者埋葬了。

sentences.english: A Finnish graveyard is a breath-taking sight on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕夜芬蘭的墓地呈現出一幅激動人心的景象。

definition: grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
